description.mekanismgenerators.control_r: A collection of control rods used to halt a fission chain reaction. Placed on top of a tower of Fission Fuel Assemblies.
description.mekanismgenerators.fission_f: A cluster of fuel rods used to house fission fuel within a Fission Reactor. These can be stacked on top of each other.
description.mekanismgenerators.fission_r: Lead-infused steel casing used to create a Fission Reactor. Mostly heat-resistant, mostly radiation-resistant, and mostly safe!
A block that can be used to monitor or control the Fission Reactor with Redstone.
description.mekanismgenerators.laser_foc: A panel of Reactor Glass that is capable of absorbing optical energy and thereby heating up the Fusion Reactor.
description.mekanismgenerators.reactor.l: Activate the reactor when powered, and deactivate when unpowered
The reactor's core heat capacity has been met
Output when the reactor reaches critical damage levels (100%+).
The reactor has insufficient fuel to sustain a reaction
Will not emit a Redstone signal
Output when the reactor has excess waste
Output when the reactor has reached the required heat level to ignite
Output when the reactor reaches dangerous temperatures
description.mekanismgenerators.reactor_g: Reinforced glass that can be used in the Fusion Reactor multiblock.
fission.mekanismgenerators.invalid_bad_c: Could not form, improper placement for Control Rod Assembly at %s.
fission.mekanismgenerators.invalid_extra: Could not form, found extra Control Rod Assembly at %s.
fission.mekanismgenerators.invalid_malfo: Could not form, invalid Fission Fuel Assembly placement at %s.
fission.mekanismgenerators.invalid_missi: Could not form, no fuel assembly structures present.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_bad_c: Could not form, found improperly placed Rotational Complex at %s. Complex must be centred above Turbine Rotors.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_bad_r: Could not form, found invalid Turbine Rotor at %s. Turbine Rotors must be centred below Rotational Complex.
Could not form, invalid Turbine Rotor arrangement.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_conde: Could not form, found improperly placed Saturating Condenser at %s. Saturating Condensers must be above Pressure Disperser layer.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_even_: Could not form, width and length of structure must be odd.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_malfo: Could not form, Electromagnetic Coil arrangement is malformed. Coils must be connected to Rotational Complex and adjacently connected.
Could not form, Pressure Disperser arrangement is malformed. Dispersers must create complete horizontal layer surrounding Rotational Complex.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_missi: Could not form, no Rotational Complex present.
Could not form, expected but didn't find Pressure Disperser at %s.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_rotor: Could not form, rotors are invalid (non-contiguous).
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_too_n: Could not form, structure is too narrow to support turbine size.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_vent_: Could not form, found a Turbine Vent below Pressure Disperser layer. Vents must be at or above vertical position of disperser layer.
